verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* there \w appeared|strong="G3700"\w* a \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w wonder|strong="G4592"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*; a \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* clothed \w with|strong="G4016"\w* the \w sun|strong="G2246"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w moon|strong="G4582"\w* \w under|strong="G5270"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w head|strong="G2776"\w* a \w crown|strong="G4735"\w* of \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \w stars|strong="G0792"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* she \w being|strong="G2192"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w child|strong="G1064"\w* \w cried|strong="G2896"\w*, travailing in \w birth|strong="G5605"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w pained|strong="G0928"\w* to be \w delivered|strong="G5088"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* there \w appeared|strong="G3700"\w* \w another|strong="G0243"\w* \w wonder|strong="G4592"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w behold|strong="G2400"\w* a \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w red|strong="G4450"\w* \w dragon|strong="G1404"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w heads|strong="G2776"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w ten|strong="G1176"\w* \w horns|strong="G2768"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w crowns|strong="G1238"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w heads|strong="G2776"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w tail|strong="G3769"\w* \w drew|strong="G4951"\w* the third \w part|strong="G5154"\w* of the \w stars|strong="G0792"\w* of \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* did \w cast|strong="G0906"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w dragon|strong="G1404"\w* \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* the \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* which was \w ready|strong="G3195"\w* to be \w delivered|strong="G5088"\w*, \w for|strong="G2443"\w* to \w devour|strong="G2719"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w child|strong="G5043"\w* as soon \w as|strong="G3752"\w* it was \w born|strong="G5088"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* she brought \w forth|strong="G5088"\w* a \w man|strong="G0730"\w* \w child|strong="G5207"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* was \w to|strong="G3195"\w* \w rule|strong="G4165"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w nations|strong="G1484"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* a \w rod|strong="G4464"\w* of \w iron|strong="G4603"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w child|strong="G5043"\w* was caught \w up|strong="G0726"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add to\add* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w throne|strong="G2362"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* \w fled|strong="G5343"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w wilderness|strong="G2048"\w*, \w where|strong="G3699"\w* she \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* a \w place|strong="G5117"\w* \w prepared|strong="G2090"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they should \w feed|strong="G5142"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w* a \w thousand|strong="G5507"\w* two \w hundred|strong="G1250"\w* \add and\add* \w threescore|strong="G1835"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* there \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w war|strong="G4171"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*: \w Michael|strong="G3413"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w angels|strong="G0032"\w* \w fought|strong="G4170"\w* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* the \w dragon|strong="G1404"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w dragon|strong="G1404"\w* \w fought|strong="G4170"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w angels|strong="G0032"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w prevailed|strong="G2480"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*; \w neither|strong="G3777"\w* \w was|strong="G2147"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* any \w more|strong="G2089"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w dragon|strong="G1404"\w* was cast \w out|strong="G0906"\w*, that \w old|strong="G0744"\w* \w serpent|strong="G3789"\w*, \w called|strong="G2564"\w* the \w Devil|strong="G1228"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Satan|strong="G4567"\w*, which \w deceiveth|strong="G4105"\w* the \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \w world|strong="G3625"\w*: he was cast \w out|strong="G0906"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w angels|strong="G0032"\w* were cast \w out|strong="G0906"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* a \w loud|strong="G3173"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w Now|strong="G0737"\w* is \w come|strong="G1096"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w strength|strong="G1411"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w power|strong="G1849"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* the \w accuser|strong="G2725"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* is cast \w down|strong="G2598"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w accused|strong="G2723"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w night|strong="G3571"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w overcame|strong="G3528"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* of the \w Lamb|strong="G0721"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w testimony|strong="G3141"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w loved|strong="G0025"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w lives|strong="G5590"\w* \w unto|strong="G0891"\w* the \w death|strong="G2288"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G1223"\w* \w rejoice|strong="G2165"\w*, \add ye\add* \w heavens|strong="G3772"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w ye|strong="G3588"\w* that \w dwell|strong="G4637"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*. \w Woe|strong="G3759"\w* to the \w inhabiters|strong="G2730"\w* of the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*! \w for|strong="G3754"\w* the \w devil|strong="G1228"\w* is come \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w wrath|strong="G2372"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* he knoweth \w that|strong="G1492"\w* he \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* but a \w short|strong="G3641"\w* \w time|strong="G2540"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* the \w dragon|strong="G1404"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he was \w cast|strong="G0906"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, he \w persecuted|strong="G1377"\w* the \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* \w which|strong="G3748"\w* brought \w forth|strong="G5088"\w* the \w man|strong="G0730"\w* \add child\add*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* to the \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* were \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w wings|strong="G4420"\w* of a \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w eagle|strong="G0105"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* she might \w fly|strong="G4072"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w wilderness|strong="G2048"\w*, \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w*, \w where|strong="G3699"\w* she is \w nourished|strong="G5142"\w* \w for|strong="G1563"\w* a \w time|strong="G2540"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w times|strong="G2540"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w half|strong="G2255"\w* a \w time|strong="G2540"\w*, \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w face|strong="G4383"\w* of the \w serpent|strong="G3789"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w serpent|strong="G3789"\w* cast \w out|strong="G0906"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* a \w flood|strong="G4215"\w* \w after|strong="G3694"\w* the \w woman|strong="G1135"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he might \w cause|strong="G4160"\w* \w her|strong="G3778"\w* to be carried away of the \w flood|strong="G4216"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* \w helped|strong="G0997"\w* the \w woman|strong="G1135"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* \w opened|strong="G0455"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* swallowed \w up|strong="G2666"\w* the \w flood|strong="G4215"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* the \w dragon|strong="G1404"\w* cast \w out|strong="G0906"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w dragon|strong="G1404"\w* was \w wroth|strong="G3710"\w* \w with|strong="G1909"\w* the \w woman|strong="G1135"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G0565"\w* to \w make|strong="G4160"\w* \w war|strong="G4171"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* the \w remnant|strong="G3062"\w* of \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w seed|strong="G4690"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w keep|strong="G5083"\w* the \w commandments|strong="G1785"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* the \w testimony|strong="G3141"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.
